entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
